backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing contacts keyed by caller principal, with submit, lookup, and listing plus static cafe info.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain text listing of frontend file summaries for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting title, meta description, favicon, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router setup using hash history with routes for home, about, services, and contact pages.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form with validation, backend submission, and success state when message already submitted.
frontend/src/components/contact/MapEmbed: Iframe wrapper showing the configured Google Maps embed URL.
frontend/src/components/contact/WhatsApp: Styled WhatsApp button linking to wa.me using configured number.
frontend/src/components/home/GallerySect: Gallery grid of static images with dialog-based zoom view.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with new heading, subheading, service CTA, and WhatsApp contact CTA plus illustration.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesPre: Renders a homepage section showing three service previews with icons, descriptions, and a link to the full services page.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Displays a grid of client testimonials with star ratings, quoted text, and user details.
frontend/src/components/home/WhyChooseUs: Shows a list of features explaining why customers should choose the service, each with an icon and description.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a job card component.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCardSkel: Empty placeholder file for a job card skeleton component.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders service categories and items in grids with icons, descriptions, prices, and a WhatsApp order button.
frontend/src/components/site/Container.t: Provides a responsive layout wrapper that adds consistent horizontal padding.
frontend/src/components/site/FloatingWha: Shows a fixed WhatsApp floating button linking to the cafe’s WhatsApp number.
Renders the footer with about info, quick links, contact details, and social media icons.
Displays the site header with logo, navigation links, WhatsApp button, and a mobile menu toggle.
Defines the main layout including header, routed content area, footer, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/config/cafeInfo.ts: Stores basic cafe details such as name, phone numbers, email, address, and map embed URL.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Provides social media and WhatsApp URLs derived from cafe info.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service category and item interfaces and provides structured data for all offered services.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handlers, and initializes AuthClient with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobs.ts: Empty placeholder file for job-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching cafe info, contacts, submitted status, and submitting contact data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS config defining light/dark theme variables, typography rules, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/govJobModel.ts: Empty placeholder for government job model definitions.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/govJobsClient.ts: Empty placeholder for government jobs API client.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/jobFiltering.ts: Empty placeholder for job filtering utilities.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/officialDomains.ts: Empty placeholder for official domain list utilities.
frontend/src/lib/jobs/remotiveClient.ts: Empty placeholder for Remotive jobs API client.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and overview sections using reusable components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, business hours, a contact form, and map placeholder for the cafe.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page combining hero, services preview, gallery, testimonials, and a CTA section.
frontend/src/pages/JobsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for the jobs listing page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows service categories and offers a CTA for custom service inquiries.
frontend/src/seo/Seo.tsx: React component that sets document title, meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter tags, and injects LocalBusiness JSON-LD based on provided SEO props.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the website’s purpose, architecture, image requirements, and existing implemented features.
